section.name: Customizing Privacy Statement
section.div:
To modify privacy statement do the following:
Open webapps/openmeetings/WEB-INF/classes/org/apache/openmeetings/web/pages/PrivacyPage.html
Perform necessary changes
restart OM

section.name: Translating Privacy Statement
section.div:
To create privacy statement in your language do the following:
Create new file webapps/openmeetings/WEB-INF/classes/org/apache/openmeetings/web/pages/PrivacyPage_LANG_CODE.html
LANG_CODE should be in format [language code]_[country ISO code], _[country ISO code] block is optional
for ex. de can be suffix for German, file name will be webapps/openmeetings/WEB-INF/classes/org/apache/openmeetings/web/pages/PrivacyPage_de.html
pt can be suffix for Portuguese, file name will be webapps/openmeetings/WEB-INF/classes/org/apache/openmeetings/web/pages/PrivacyPage_pt.html
pt_BR can be suffix for Brazilian version of Portuguese, file name will be webapps/openmeetings/WEB-INF/classes/org/apache/openmeetings/web/pages/PrivacyPage_pt_BR.html
Perform translation
restart OM
